Options.Name: useAsyncActions
Options.Description: Switch to indicate whether to generate async controller actions

Options.Name: noViews
Options.Description: Switch to indicate whether to generate CRUD views

Options.Name: restWithNoViews
Options.Description: Specify this switch to generate a Controller with REST style API, noViews is assumed and any view related options are ignored

Options.Name: readWriteActions
Options.Description: Specify this switch to generate Controller with read/write actions when a Model class is not used

Options.Name: referenceScriptLibraries
Options.Description: Switch to specify whether to reference script libraries in the generated views

Options.Name: useDefaultLayout
Options.Description: Switch to specify that default layout should be used for the views

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: Use this option to overwrite existing files

Options.Name: relativeFolderPath
Options.Description: Specify the relative output folder path from project where the file needs to be generated, if not specified, file will be generated in the project folder

Options.Name: controllerNamespace
Options.Description: Specify the name of the namespace to use for the generated controller

Options.Name: useSqlite
Options.Description: Flag to specify if DbContext should use SQLite instead of SQL Server.
